issue.title: [Release] Allow archery to support MINOR tickets
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16656](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16656). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As discussed on the PR creating a ticket.

The PR changes some of the automated commit messages to contain the MINOR keyword and updates archery to be able to know that a ticket is a MINOR one when processing the commit title.
